ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I will guide you to your Lord so that you may fear Him?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then I will guide you to your Lord that you may come to fear Him.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that I may direct you to your Lord and then you hold Him in awe?'”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I shall guide you to your Lord so that you may perhaps have fear of Him".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And I may guide you to your Lord, so that you may fear.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that I guide you to your Lord, so you should fear Him"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I will guide you to your Lord so that you should fear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that I should guide thee to thy Lord, then thou shalt fear?"'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then I will guide thee to thy Lord and thou shalt fear (Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you want me to guide you to your Lord, so that you should fear Him?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then shall guide thee Unto thy Lord so that thou shalt fear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I will guide you to your Lord, that you may fear [Him]?’’ ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that I guide thee to thy Lord, so thou shouldst fear Him?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that I guide you to your Lord, so you should fear Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: that I might guide you to your Lord, so that you fear (Him)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I will guide you to your Lord, and you will turn reverent.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:19] and allow me to guide you to your Lord, to show you how to know Him (ma‘rifa) by way of proofs, so that you may have fear [of Him]?” ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then I will guide thee) I will call you (to thy Lord and thou shalt fear (Him)) and therefore surrender to Him. 727
